metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13845 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Sylabs Singularity 3.0 through 3.5 has Improper Validation of an Integrity Check Value. Image integrity is not validated when an ECL policy is enforced. The fingerprint required by the ECL is compared against the signature object descriptor(s) in the SIF file, rather than to a cryptographically validated signature.

criterions.comment: singularity-container: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
